QuestData.Title: A Gathering of Covenants
QuestData.Description:
Though the Jailer remains confined to the Maw, his cruelty extends beyond the bounds of his prison.
Thankfully, the Archon is recovering from the attack. Though I am told her wound has an... unsettling quality.
The Eternal Ones and their allies await you and Highlord Fordragon in the Arbiter's chamber. I shall open the way.
With her voice have I spoken.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Tal-Inara to enter the Arbiter's chambers.
QuestData.RewardText: <Bolvar stares in wonder at the sight before him.>
